title: Needle-free injections could become a reality, thanks to lasers and the 'bubble gun'
description: Researchers in the Netherlands are developing the 'Bubble Gun' which uses laser technology to deliver 'virtually painless injections'.
cleaned_text: a reality, thanks to lasers and the 'bubble gun' The "Bubble Gun" is still in development as an alternative to traditional needles.
